about_the_game:
Your name is Jiang Feng, an undercover cop embedded in the Yelaihui criminal organization, living a double life for the past eight years. After the sudden death of the gang leader, Ding Ye, a power struggle erupts between the two factions vying for succession: the Ding faction and the Liu faction. You find yourself forced into a complex web of schemes and power plays. Under pressure from the police, your mission is to dismantle the entire criminal organization and expose the true mastermind behind it all.
Throughout this journey, you navigate emotional entanglements with the female lead, face dilemmas of loyalty or betrayal with the gang's big brother, and become deeply intertwined with your companions, making every step treacherous. In this world of love, hatred, and vendettas, you must walk the thin line between morality and corruption, seeking the truth while exploring the possibility of your own redemption.
Should you trust? Should you speak out? Should you run? Should you kill? This is a battle between light and darkness, justice and evil, where every choice you make is fraught with danger and uncertainty. Betrayal, love, and power schemes—each step could lead to the abyss of darkness, or it might be the key to uncovering the truth.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features detailed combat animations, including blood effects and depictions of bodily injuries during fights, making it suitable for adult players.
The game also contains partial nudity and suggestive content but does not include explicit depictions of sexual acts.

detailed_description:
Your name is Jiang Feng, an undercover cop embedded in the Yelaihui criminal organization, living a double life for the past eight years. After the sudden death of the gang leader, Ding Ye, a power struggle erupts between the two factions vying for succession: the Ding faction and the Liu faction. You find yourself forced into a complex web of schemes and power plays. Under pressure from the police, your mission is to dismantle the entire criminal organization and expose the true mastermind behind it all.
Throughout this journey, you navigate emotional entanglements with the female lead, face dilemmas of loyalty or betrayal with the gang's big brother, and become deeply intertwined with your companions, making every step treacherous. In this world of love, hatred, and vendettas, you must walk the thin line between morality and corruption, seeking the truth while exploring the possibility of your own redemption.
Should you trust? Should you speak out? Should you run? Should you kill? This is a battle between light and darkness, justice and evil, where every choice you make is fraught with danger and uncertainty. Betrayal, love, and power schemes—each step could lead to the abyss of darkness, or it might be the key to uncovering the truth.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14或以上
  • Processor: Apple M系列显卡
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A first-person live-action crime suspense interactive experience. Multiple story branches and endings — Dozens of story branches and six different endings. Live-action performances and on-location shooting — Real actors and real settings enhance immersion in both the plot and characters.
